meanings.definition: The quality or state of being nosy.
meanings.sent1: Her nosinesses often led her to eavesdrop on conversations.
meanings.sent2: I don't appreciate nosinesses when it comes to my personal life.
meanings.sent3: His nosinesses got him into trouble when he accidentally overheard a secret.
meanings.sent4: The cat's nosinesses knew no bounds as it explored every corner of the house.
meanings.sent5: The nosinesses of the detective helped solve the mystery in record time.

meanings.definition: The act of being overly curious or prying into others' affairs.
meanings.sent1: Nosinesses can sometimes lead to misunderstandings and hurt feelings.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't resist her nosinesses and peeked through the keyhole.
meanings.sent3: The nosinesses of the squirrel caused it to get stuck in a tricky situation.
meanings.sent4: His nosinesses were like a magnifying glass, revealing secrets hidden in plain sight.
meanings.sent5: The nosinesses of the journalist made her a master at uncovering scandals.
